record.field: Are you sure you want to modify Shopify credentials?
Shopify Identifier
The record cannot have more than one Shopify identifier per web shop.
Each Shopify location can only be linked to one warehouse.
Shopify Identifiers
A Shopify order can only be imported as a sale once.
To update products on the shop "%(shop)s", you must set the currency to "%(shopify_currency)s" instead of "%(shop_currency)s".
To update products on the shop "%(shop)s", you must set the language to "%(shopify_primary_locale)s" instead of "%(shop_language)s".
To update product "%(product)s" on Shopify, you must use an unit of measure without digits.
To change the template of product "%(product)s" you must unpublish it from the Shopify web shops.
Failed to save custom collection "%(category)s" with error: %(error)s
Failed to save product "%(template)s" with error: %(error)s
Failed to save image "%(image)s" for product "%(template)s" with error: %(error)s
Failed to save variant "%(product)s" with error: %(error)s
Failed to save inventory item for product "%(product)s" with error: %(error)s
Failed to save fulfillment for sale "%(sale)s" with error: %(error)s
Failed to save refund for sale "%(sale)s" with error: %(error)s
A shopify transaction can only be imported as payment once.
The shipment can not have more than one Shopify identifier per sale.
To process the sale "%(sale)s" you must set a product on the line "%(line)s".
Failed to find fulfillment order for %(quantity)s of move "%(move)s".
